title: AAP Delegation Claim
description: Schema for the 'delegation' claim in AAP tokens, tracking authorization delegation chains

depth.description: Current delegation depth (0 = original token, 1+ = derived via Token Exchange)

chain.description: Delegation chain from origin to current token. chain[0] = origin, chain[n] = current.

items.description: Agent or tool identifier in the delegation chain

parent_jti.description: JTI (JWT ID) of the parent token from which this was derived

issued_at_depth.description: Timestamps when token was issued at each depth (for delegation tracking)

privilege_reduction.description: Description of how privileges were reduced during delegation

capabilities_removed.description: List of actions removed during delegation

constraints_added.description: List of additional constraints added during delegation

lifetime_reduced_by.description: Number of seconds token lifetime was reduced by
